Eserese nke Vader, otu igwe egwu ọnwụ Polish, nwere ọba studio iri na abụọ, ọba mkpokọta abụọ, ọba ndụ abụọ, egwu asatọ agbatịkwu, otu ọba mkpuchi, ọba vidiyo anọ, otu itoolu, vidiyo egwu iri na abụọ, na ọba ngosi atọ
N'ịbụ nke e hibere na 1983, ndị otu ahụ tọrọ ntọala site na bassist Piotr "Peter" Wiwczarek, na onye na-agụ egwú Zbigniew "Vika" Wróblewski.
